User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://1001s.info/sitemap.xml

# Allow all search engines to crawl the site
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

# Disallow crawling of admin or private areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow crawling of all tools and pages
Allow: /tools/
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /images/
